info.name: Aggro-Gator Dark
info.description: A dark theme for the site aggro-gator.com.
info.additionalInfo:
Don't like something? You are free to modify / repost CSS. 

Have a smaller screen? Someone made an edit just for you. https://userstyles.org/styles/132687/ag-dark-re-modded

Did something break? Let me know in the feedback section below.
